title: 【YIP#8】关于建立YFII DAO Grant制度以及Grant申请模版
body:
1 前言
提案编号: YIP#8
提案名称: 关于建立YFII DAO Grant制度以及Grant申请模版
提案作者: Aramis
提案领域: Grant
提案时间: 10/19/2020
有关提案: 无
替换提案: 无

2 总结
Grant制度已经被其他项目证明为行之有效的DAO激励手段，因此本提案建议在YFII DAO中实行Grant制度，以对社区成员的贡献进行经济激励及促进社区持续发展，本提案同时提供了Grant申请的模版

3 动机
3.1 YFII DAO已经有较大社区规模，并且有不少社区成员目前正以志愿者身份参与YFII DAO的运营和开发，为了社区的可持续发展， 必须尽快落实对于社区志愿者的经济激励手段。
3.2 随着YFII DAO 社区不断发展，涌现出比较多的发展机会及优秀的提案，为了使这些发展机会、优秀提案、新产品、关键性项目等得到有效落实，亟待建立Grant制度。

4 提案方案正文
建立Grant制度：
社区成员可以就自己的计划，按照Grant模版，发起专门的Grant提案申请，由社区或者Grant委员会批准通过。但并不是所有社区工作都有必要申请Grant, Grant申请基于自愿原则, 也可以由他人代为申请.

4.1新计划Grant
如果计划尚未开始，Grant发起者可以先提交Grant申请，并设置多个可考核的milestone，以及每个milestone对应的Grant金额，一旦Grant方案整体通过之后，Grant申请者即可按照Milestone设置开始工作，并在每个完成Milestone后获得相应的Grant，无需另外提交额外的Grant提案。

4.2已完成项目Grant
如果计划已经完成，申请者可以就自己已经完成的工作，按照Grant申请模版提交Grant申请，一旦通过，即可全额获得grant奖励

4.3建立Grant委员会
由社区投票选择5人出任Grant委员会成员，负责审批和管理Grant申请和资金。Grant委员会也有Grant奖励，在Grant委员会选举后，由委员会发起Grant提案申请grant，一旦社区投票通过，即正式成立Grant委员会。每届Grant委员会任期6个月，期间如果有委员无法正常履职，可以提出退出委员会，并由社区提名，或者申请者自荐替补，新成员替补，或者成员集体换届，需要重新发起社区投票批准。具体的Grant委员会管理制度可以另行发起提案讨论

4.4在论坛建立专门的Grant板块
该板块专门公示Grant提案，以及Grant委员会的构成和其他一切有关Grant提案、制度、委员会人选的讨论.

4.5 建立Grant申请模版(如下)
YFII DAO GRANT提案模板

Grant名称：
申请日期：
申请者：
有关提案:
a、申请金额
a.1 总金额：
a.2 接收地址：
b、提案概要
概要描述本提案的目的、资金用于解决或将用于解决的问题，解决问题的方式、方法，介绍本提案者在社区中主要负责的工作
c、交付成果
c.1 完成日期：填写最终完成日期
c.2 交付成果：填写最终交付成果及最终交付、呈现的方式
d、里程碑
描述项目主要时间节点及这些主要时间节点交付成果。
e、详细的项目计划及预算
准备如何开展项目
f、项目交付质量评估方法及衡量指标
由申请者建议如何评估项目成果及相关可衡量的质量指标
g、项目风险
描述项目可能存在的财务风险、技术风险等及对应的解决方法

5 方案执行后可能带来的好处
社区志愿者靠热情工作无法长期持续，经济激励是有效手段，并且获得经济激励的社区工作也可以更容易考核，有助于YFII DAO社区工作的高质量和可持续的开展

6 需要注意的方案的潜在风险
6.1Grant如果管理和审批不当，容易被浪费
6.2Grant如果申请过于复杂或者门槛过高，会打击社区成员的工资积  极性

7 是否有其他项目采用了类似的方案
Polkadot、Cosmos、以太坊等主流项目都采取了Grant制度，并获得了相当好的成果

8 实施该方案可能需要哪些资源和协助
8.1Grant委员会成员需要得到社区大部分成员的信任, 证明自己有能力并且能够公正公平高效的管理和发放Grant
8.2Vault规模需要不断扩大,以确保Grant资金池有充足的金额支付Grant

9 建议由谁/团队来负责推进该方案
    社区共同推进

YFII DAO Grant system and Grant application template

1 Introduction
Proposal number: YIP#8
Proposal Name: about the establishment of YFII(DFI.MONEY) Dao grant system and grant application template
Author of the proposal: Aramis
Proposal area: Grant
Time of proposal: 10 / 19 / 2020
Related proposals: no
Replacement proposal: no

2 Summary
The Grant system has been proven effective by other projects as DAO incentives. Therefore, the proposal proposes a Grant system in YFII(DFI.MONEY) DAO to stimulate economic contributions to community members. This proposal also provides a template for Grant applications.

3 Motivation
YFII(DFI.MONEY) DAO already has a larger community scale, and many community members are currently participating in the operation and development of YFII(DFI.MONEY) DAO as volunteers. In order to achieve sustainable development of the community, the economic incentives for community volunteers must be implemented as soon as possible.

4. Main body of the proposal
Establish grant system:The members of the community can initiate a specific Grant proposal on their own plan according to the Grant template, approved by the community or the Grant Committee. However, it is not necessary for all community work to apply for Grant. Grant application is based on the principle of voluntariness and can also be applied by others.

4.1 New plan grant
If the plan has not yet started, the grant initiator can submit a grant application first, and set up multiple assessable milestones and the grant amount corresponding to each milestone. Once the grant scheme is approved as a whole, the grant applicant can start work according to the milestone setting, and obtain the corresponding grant after each milestone is completed. There is no need to submit additional grant proposals.

4.2 Completed project grant
If the plan has been completed, the applicant can submit the Grant application according to the Grant application template for the work she has completed. Once passed, she can get the grant award in full.

4.3 Establishment of grant Committee
5 members of the grant committee are elected by the community to be responsible for approving and managing grant applications and funds. The Grant committee also has Grant awards. After the election of the grant Committee, the Committee initiates Grant's application for grant. Once the community vote is passed, the Grant committee will be formally established. Each grant Committee has a term of 6 months. If a member fails to perform his duties normally, he may withdraw from the Committee and nominate the community, or if the applicant substitutes himself, the new member is substitutes, or the general membership is changed. The specific Grant committee management system can be initiated separately.

4.4 Establish a special grant section in the Forum
This section is dedicated to the grant proposal, as well as the composition of the grant Committee, and all other discussions on grant proposal, system, and committee candidates

4.5 Establish grant application template (as follows)
YFII(DFI.MONEY) Dao grant proposal template

Grant Name:
Application date:
applicant:
Related proposals:
a. Application amount
 a.1  total amount:
 a.2  receiving address:
b.  Proposal outline
A brief description of the purpose of this proposal, funds for solving or solving problems, ways and means of solving problems, and introducing the main responsibilities of the proposer in the community.
c. Delivery
c.1  completion date: fill in the final completion date
c.2  delivery results: fill in the final delivery results and the way of final delivery and presentation
d.  Milestone
Describe the main time nodes of the project and the delivery results of these major time nodes.
e. Detailed project plan and budget
How to prepare for the project
f. Evaluation method and measurement index of project delivery quality
How to evaluate project results and related measurable quality indicators by applicants
g. Project risk
Describe the possible financial and technical risks of the project and the corresponding solutions

5 possible benefits of the implementation of the proposal
Community volunteers are not able to sustain their work for a long time by enthusiastic work. Economic incentives are effective means, and community work with economic incentives can also be easier to assess, contributing to the high quality and sustainable development of YFII(DFI.MONEY) DAO community work.

6 potential risks to be noted
6.1grant is easy to be wasted if it is not properly managed and approved
6.2Grant if the application is too complicated or the threshold is too high, it will hurt the enthusiasm of the members of the community.

7 Are there other projects that have adopted similar schemes
Polkadot, Cosmos, Ethernet and other mainstream projects have adopted the Grant system, and have achieved fairly good results.

8 What resources and assistance may be needed to implement the scheme?
8.1Grant committee need to be trusted by most members of the community to prove that they are capable and fair, fair and efficient in managing and distributing grant.
8.2Vault scale needs to be expanded to ensure that Grant pool has enough money to pay Grant.

9 Team is suggested to be responsible for promoting the program
  YFII community
author: 0xA3f1a492cAbd7DCAea145ac02bF5624d91698850
